attributes.action: Make it illegal to require digital id to obtain any form of services in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Because it is a breach of human rights & very unethical to create any such situation. It goes against everything it means to be British a nation which formed human rights & free speech, who's men & woman who have given their lives to defend such rights.

This should never be forgotten & encroaching on citizens lives should never be allowed, it is a massive o er reach of power & the idea needs to be made illegal so future generations do not need to continue this fight
attributes.background: I want Parliament to go by the will of British people & introduce into law a Bill that makes it illegal to require to need digital id for any form of service, product or life function within the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Protect the Right to Live Without a Digital ID
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745717
